hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REGISTRY_REPO_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is used to identify the name of the docker registry repository that this image is going to be pushed to

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ECR_REGISTRY_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The url of the elastic container registry (ECR) where the newly created image is to be pushed to from this server and pulled from by the target docker host

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_BUILD_CONTEXT_GIT_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: You can modify this value to pull a build context stored in a branch other than master.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_TAG_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The value the image being built is to tagged with for identification within the local and registry repositories.
